code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import logPasBase from'./../../logPasBase';function ButtonSignIn(props){var route;var json=logPasBase;for(var i=0;i<json.length;i++){if(json[i].login===props.login&&json[i].password===props.password){route="/Home";break;}else{route="/";}}return React.createElement("div",{className:"bottomAuth"},React.createElement("div",{className:"failAuth"},props.authIndicator===1?React.createElement("div",null,"\u041D\u0443 \u0442\u044B \u0447\u0435\u0433\u043E? :( \u041F\u043E\u0434\u0443\u043C\u0430\u0439 \u0435\u0449\u0435"):React.createElement("div",null)),React.createElement("div",{className:"button"},React.createElement(Link,{className:"linkSignIn",to:route,onClick:props.changeIndicatorAuth},"\u0412\u0445\u043E\u0434")));}export default ButtonSignIn;
